column2: `` virginia board trade gentlemen philadelphia january 3rd. 1780. consequence letter delegates congress august last procure continent sum money adequate purchases officers soldiers virginia line day great difficulty negotiated 120,000 dollars board treasury according determination congress must instantly paid quarter-master general. mr moss upon accurate settlement affairs city fall debt sum-and principally purchase light cloathing designed troops marching southward. 1 appears purchase mentioned extremely judicious-to judgment things sort abundantly expensive course months perhaps gotten. observe order upon board drawn amount 130,000 dollars 120,000 sufficient answer january 3 1780 purposes mr moss. shall retain remaining 10,000 dollars much assembly pleased allow delegates congress treasurer accordingly give board credit sum make charge agt. . honor great respect gentlemen obedient humble servant c. griffin p.s. suppose heard maryland seized flour state designed virginia french fleet. 2 ``

`` william ellery william greene sir philadelphia jany. 4th. 1780. since last honour writing excellency 1 nothing material hath occurred may thought negligent unless write assembly therefore resume imagined consisted returning transports private vessels bound europe `` sailed 23d ultmo. last division consisting 110 sail principally large ships put sea large number troops fleet great number commanded destined uncertain. generally thought part least bound southward reported genl. clinton person commands expedition. genl. parsons commands body troops advanced towards sound wrote genl. washington `` number southern refugees said board fleet among governor martin.\ `` 2 last tuesday heavy storm. hope may pleasure adopting queen elizabeth 's motto afflavit deus et dissipantur. said spaniard hath taken pensacola. prove true procede capture st. augustine would make fine diversion favor charlestown provided expedition n. york intended south-carolina. considerable body troops march join genl lincoln arrive late succour charlestown supposed intended attack. busily employed financing procuring supplies army. bills exchange falling people begin apprehensive evils appretiation. favorable symptoms. put stop emissions tax procedes improbable money depretiate. letter genl. treasurer state continental treasury board gave great pleasure. 3 seems letter great part quota tax collected whole would treasury first instant. since wrote foregoing seen gentleman maryland informed bills exchange every article falling state left days. also since time seen letter genl lincoln contained nothing new. congress order 'd treasury board prepare bills exchange sold rate twenty five january 4 1780 dollars four six pence sterling purchaser receives bill deposit loan office equal sum contl. money estimated rate receive yearly six per cent. think expressed idea clearly resolution soon published. incessant large demands army slowness taxes come made measure necessary. indeed critical period. however get along two three months hope shall proceed ease satisfaction future. considerable body men inlisted war. well recruited make respectable army. difficulty furnish supplies. give steadiness currency several states exert obtain quotas supplies soon assigned recommended difficulties removed. wishing success every measure calculated public benefit prosperity state rhode-island providence plantations health happiness many new years excellency continue great respect yr excellency 's obedt. hble servt. wm. ellery please turn. p.s. 4 since writing foregoing `` john mathews thomas bee dear sir philadelphia jany. 5. 1780. 1 received october 18 intended mr. rutledge 30th ulto. major lucas rutledge entrusted dispatches place last given thoughts able reach place destination. account majr. lucas gives truely melancholy. hope god disorder may take favourable turn may preserved us think loss would heavy one country family friends. present time discuss matter taxation expect 'ere reaches warmly engaged business far different kind. destressing beyond expression hear accounts quarters disaffection call late conduct nothing less back country people. good god. nothing done tend either perswaid coerce duty. indeed dear friend day come depend militia 's turning repel present danger may subject us imputation want vigour brand already fixed us. passing. carolina virginia whenever urged necessity sending men aid constant reply `` south carolina expect send men support nothing. men go sacrifice health lives. carolina militia snug homes. much expect us fight battles them.\ `` hints kind thrown congress. principally appologized men first instance second treated insolence keeness keenest severity january 5 1780 let us censured whomever may congress last class men earth ought presume. received copy rutleges instructions done everything required except sending part stores late done. three frigates hope safe likewise vessel military stores. virginia. carolina lines consisted 3000 men examining times serving would expire could reach detained reduces 2300 fine men. little apprehension loss town day 500 rest 600 miles almost despair. great difficulty getting men march want necessaries particularly shoes without impossible encounter inclemencies season. indeed men suffered severely coming camp want shoes marched confident disposition officers moments time lost. carolina militia support hold town need apprehension expiration times service happens troops certainly. blands baylors two regiments horse hopes long master clinton. congress done duty 10 novr. applyed troops 2 might best part way. carolina first refused hesitated untill rivers shut ice men must march whole way land. misfortunes principally owing want proper spirit first. safe conscience say done duty country nothing thought could beneficial applyed unremitted sollicitations far continental circumstances would admit end procured. late fault imputable flatter country justice think acquit want attention interest. say wish hear often. time request would afforded infinite pleasure always felt communicated communicating thoughts esteemed friend. much whole faculties present much engroced destresses space left mind turn anything passes. must therefore reverse proposition intreat give account everything passes often find leisure opportunity. sent express two hours got account sailing fleet new york strictly charged sixteen days give information reach. god send success january.6 1780 already twice preserved us eminent danger hope yet guard protect us greatest tryals hitherto struggle. believe dr. sir sincere regard yr. obedt. servt. p.s. know without name various reasons better omitted ``
